derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from French, from auto- 'self' + Latin clavus 'nail' or clavis 'key' (so named because it is self-fastening)

means.word_mean: 1. a device for heating substances above their boiling point; used to manufacture chemicals or to sterilize surgical instruments
